messages.content: He's 38 he should retire I hope he at least gets traded to a contender
im done with my break im going to make more i promise
Not sinking in is it. I'm hardly speaking in riddles. Good luck

I had to watch x3 to make sure I didn't miss something 😂
I hope that you still send her a bag each Christmas?
I mean, they did just that in Djibouti I believe, and Sri Lanka before. Hopefully Kenya can avoid the debt trap
I hope everyone has a nice day.
Usually they dont even show up when you call them and they are a rare sight in the city. Good luck finding one.
maybe now it'll go up to 3 an hour😎
Break ups are hard. Hope you feel better.
Good luck for everyone pronouncing [NAME] name. If he keeps scoring like this, i'll have fun listening some commentators around NHL.
I am really sorry for you, but oh my [NAME] this made me cry laughing. I hope the cat learns to like you eventually
I believe that you can search for providers here. Good luck and good on ya.
Try your luck with ranked. it you stick it out enough you'll get high enough to play with good players
Hope all is well now xo
I know right. It feels really good when someone acknowledges your existence. I hope more moments like these come for you.
I would think that I hope the Wilpons die.
Has any news been confirmed of whose playing [NAME]. I hope we see him soon to grasp how charasmatic he can be
Missed that, wishful thinking, I was hoping they would team up for a little

Laughing at "indoctrinated by traditional values". Good luck in life.
Itll happen. Im 36 and i think i finally found the one last year 🤞

Man, that sounds like a big stuff around. Good luck getting it sorted
Bide your time, keep your eyes open, and build the reputation and relationship needed. The opportunity will come.
You just gotta have little faith. They are gonna need more money and maybe then we can get to Tahiti.
I hope you get the mental help that you clearly need.
There’s no evidence that 12-step programs work any better than no program, so you’re not missing anything if you quit. Good luck.
